group_1.narration: "The beauty and wits that had Caesar@and Antonius tied to her whims@were not inherent."
"It was all given to her from the girls@devoted to her service…"
"That woman…is a sham of a pharaoh…!"

group_1.textRight: Ah…AAAAAAGH!
Yes! All of it is true!

group_1.textLeft: So that means…

group_1.textRight: What that person told you…
All of it is true… There WAS someone who@broke away from our clan.

group_1.textLeft: …The answers finally reveal themselves.
It's coming together…@So Queen Cleopatra…

group_1.textRight: She…
She is the incarnation of wishes from all@the girls who served before me.
A pharaoh formed by absorbing the lives…@of so many of us…

group_1.textLeft: Yes…I see…

group_1.textRight: That answers my questions.
So Iroha had been observing her…
…because of the volume of Magical Girls@being sent to her.

group_1.textLeft: How many were there?

group_1.textRight: I have no idea…
And it doesn't matter what we know…
We were all just lives made for the pharaoh@to consume…
Heh…hee hee hee…@I finally realized it…
…No. That's wrong.
I can finally face the truth that I had long@blinded myself from…!
I was born into the Met Clan!
Raised to be devoted to the pharaoh!
Fated to live and die with her!
What a rotten life…@Oh god…
I can understand the regrets of the one@who had abandoned our clan…
Why did I have to be raised by those people?!
Why did I have to be the one who contracted@with God?!
Hee…ahahaha…!@It's already so absurd…
Go ahead…laugh.@Laugh at this pathetic way of life…

group_1.textLeft: …There's nothing funny about it.

group_1.textRight: …I can't even have a laugh?

group_1.textLeft: No…
There's no way we can laugh about this.

group_1.textRight: What…?

group_1.textLeft: I, too, made a contract with the White Beast God…Kyubey.
My circumstances were quite similar to that@of yours and your clan's.

group_1.textRight: Truly…?!
So your power comes from the White Beast@God after all!

group_1.textLeft: You remember what we called ourselves, right?@We are…

group_1.textRight: The Tokime…Clan…

group_1.textLeft: Yes…
My name is Shizuka Tokime.
I have devoted myself to the protection@of my homeland.
And I'm Ryoko Natsu, another member@of the Tokime Clan.
Same here!@I'm Chiharu Hiroe.
I am a member as well.@My name is Sunao Toki.
I know your animosity towards other people@all too well… I'm Chika Aoba.
And I am Asahi Miura, another member@of the Tokime Clan.

group_1.textRight: You all belong to the same clan, then…

group_1.textLeft: The power we acquired is called "magic…"

The girls who receive this power are called Divi…@[chara:102500:lipSynch_0][chara:102500:cheek_0][chara:102500:face_mtn_ex_050.exp3.json][wait:0.8][chara:102500:motion_000][chara:102500:cheek_0][chara:102500:face_mtn_ex_001.exp3.json][chara:102500:lipSynch_1]Well...we are called "Magical Girls"...

group_1.textRight: Magical…Girls…?
…Yes! I'm certain that God called me@a Magical Girl!

group_1.textLeft: Jumping from that, those Evil Gods you refer@to are also known as Witches.

group_1.textRight: Y-yes! He used that term as well…!

group_1.textLeft: …Ebony.
We were looking for you so that we could@gather the pieces of a concept.

group_1.textRight: The pieces…of a concept?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah. By tracing you and your era, we knew@we could gather it.

group_1.textRight: That's…you…
…Never mind that. Is it something very@important to you?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, very much so.
In becoming Magical Girls, we have@experienced so many things…
Not so long ago, we were in the grips@of a terrible conflict.
There was someone who strived to quell@that conflict…
We embarked on this journey so that we@may repay that girl's kindness.
…Well, it wasn't just one person, but several,@I should say.

group_1.textRight: …I admit I don't understand the details…
But I think I grasp what it is you're saying.

group_1.textLeft: But…after coming here, something else@has come up…

group_1.textRight: …What's that?

group_1.textLeft: It may be presumptuous of me, but…
…I want to save you!
